price: Allah; none has the right to be worshiped except Him, the Lord of the Mighty Throne.”
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
